articles.title: Bruno Fernandes learns reason he's 'never going to be captain' after Man Utd win - Mirror Online
articles.description: Bruno Fernandes was again a leading light for Man Utd as they saw off Real Sociedad with his qualities highlighted despite not donning the club armband
articles.content:
Bruno Fernandes is unlikely to be Manchester United's captain due to his forward position according to Paul Scholes.
The Portuguese star has been a revelation since moving to Old Trafford last year … [+1698 chars]
